trans-unit.target: データを提供、 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged"> </xref>イベント。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>イベントが発生したときに、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>が追加またはこのようなリストの管理対象のコレクションから削除します</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: 個々 のリストの要素にはその値が変更されたときに、このイベントは発生しません。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>によってイベントが生成された、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>場合にクラス、 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>と<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>メソッドが実行されます</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>イベント、`relatedObject`パラメーターは常に参照、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>を<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>に関連付けられている</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection></xref:System.ComponentModel.Component></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>。

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the collection.
trans-unit.target: コレクションに関連付けられているオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> has been added or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定する値かどうか、 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref>が追加またはコレクションから削除します。

trans-unit.source: The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
trans-unit.target: アクションが適用された後、リストの要素のコレクション。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: コレクションを取得<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>このイベントに関連付けられているオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得した<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>追加または削除する要素は、関連するイベントが適用された後に、コレクションの状態を表します</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that represents the current state of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>コレクションの現在の状態を表すです。

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 要素が追加またはのコレクションから削除するかどうかを示すフラグを取得<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 既存の内容を変更する<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>コレクション内では発生しません、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>イベント</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"></xref> that indicates the type of change.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"> </xref>変更の種類を示すです。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: オブジェクトのコレクションに関連付けられていることを取得<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>クラス</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>のインスタンスにオブジェクトを関連付けることにより、RelatedObject プロパティ

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the RelatedObject property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>イベント、RelatedObject プロパティは常に参照する、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>する、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>に関連付けられている</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection></xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>。
<xref:System.Object>マネージに関連付けられている<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref></xref:System.Object> 。
